title: How Does the Naivedya Become Prasadam? | Sri Satya Gaura Chandra Dasa
speaker: HG Satya Gaura Chandra Dasa

segments.key_quote: All interactions are going. This interaction means love.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that interacting with the Lord involves love, give, and take.

segments.key_quote: Now you have to give and He gives and you should take.
segments.summary: The speaker elaborates on the concept of giving Naivedya to Krishna and Krishna accepting it.

segments.key_quote: It is said that even if the Lord glances on the food, that turns into Prasadam.
segments.summary: The speaker contrasts the understanding of offering food to God in theistic and atheistic viewpoints, explaining that God's acceptance is subtle and transforms the food into Prasadam.
